name: Teleportation Game Prototype
description:
Very rough, early prototype!

An FPS where you teleport to the location of your projectile. Right now it kind of looks like bargain-bin Portal. Gameplay-wise, though, it's not really a puzzle game, just a platformer right now. I plan to add in enemies you can shoot, as well as hazards. In the end, I'm hoping to have a more fast-paced, action-heavy first-person shooter/platformer with teleporting being used not just to navigate the levels, but also to flank enemies and stuff. Maybe nothing will come of it, though. Feedback appreciated!

Controls: (PC / X-Box style controller)

WASD / left stick:     movement

mouse / right stick:     camera

space  / A-button:     jump

left-click / left-trigger:   fire projectile or teleport to projectile's position
